labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Row for tall emoji fills the entire screen
data.expected_result: Rows of completion options should have a uniform height
data.short_description: In the emoji autocomplete menu, rows for tall and thin (1x128) emoji fill the entire screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Add a tall emoji to a server, such as https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/338368557001998337.png - Start typing its name in a channel
